short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you choose if should you do something or not based on pseudorandom chance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you choose if you should do something or not based on pseudorandom chance. When you click on the extension you can see yes or no image that shows the result. DISCLAIMER: This extension is for FUN only and we are not in any way responsible for the things you do based on the decision that gives you this extension. Have fun but be smart!
